io.github.woodenbell.blix.cache

Class CacheableObject<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.woodenbell.blix.cache.CacheableObject<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the wrapped object.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cacheable

    public class CacheableObject<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Cacheable
    Wrapper for cached objects.
    Since:
    0.3

        id - The object's identifier.
        duration - The duration of the object in milliseconds.
        resetWhenUsed - If the duration should or not reset when the object is accessed.
        ob - The object to be wrapped.
